bio: Hello! I'm Shabnam Rani, a detail-oriented Business Analyst with 3+ years of experience in insurance and risk domains, supporting enterprise-level digital transformation and process optimization initiatives.

I'm skilled in gathering and translating complex business requirements into actionable deliverables including BRDs, FRDs, and SRS documents. My expertise spans across underwriting, claims processing, and risk assessment domains.

I'm proficient in analysis using SQL, Python scripting, and BI tools like Power BI and Tableau to drive insights, optimize workflows, and support strategic decisions. I've successfully reduced manual processing time by 25% and improved customer retention by 15% through data-driven dashboards.
highlights: 3+ years in insurance and risk domains
Expert in BRD, FRD, SRS documentation
Proficient in SQL, Python, Power BI, Tableau
